Overlay.Name: Overlay Color
Overlay.Hint: When using an overlay image, this overlay color is ignored.

Partial.Name: Partly Revealed Color
Partial.Hint: Leave empty to use the overlay color above, and no color when using an overlay image. If filled, this is used to color partly revealed spaces of an overlay image for the GM only.

GridReveal.Name: Extended Revealed Spaces
GridReveal.Hint: The revealed grid spaces extend a certain amount into hidden and partly revealed spaces. Does not extend the partly revealed spaces.

Position.Name: Overlay Position
Position.Hint: Whether it should display below tiles and textures or above.

Choices.behindDrawings: Cover the map and non-overhead tiles
Choices.behindTokens: Cover the map, non-overhead tiles, and drawings
